game_info.name: Tower Wizard Clone
game_info.description: Incremental wizard tower game. Click orb to generate magic. Summon spirits. Assign spirits to rooms. Spirits generate resources automatically. Ascend tower to unlock new rooms.

core_loop.description: Click orb for magic -> Summon spirits -> Assign to rooms -> Auto-generate resources -> Unlock upgrades -> Ascend tower -> Repeat

movement.description: Click on orb to generate magic

primary_action.description: Space bar clicks orb, mouse also works

key_features.name: Orb Clicking
key_features.test_method: Click orb or press Space to generate magic

key_features.name: Spirit Summoning
key_features.test_method: Press S to summon spirit when enough magic

key_features.name: Spirit Assignment
key_features.test_method: Press 1/2 to assign spirits to rooms

key_features.name: Auto Resource Generation
key_features.test_method: Assigned spirits generate resources over time

key_features.name: Tower Ascension
key_features.test_method: Press A to ascend when enough lifetime magic
